gpio.input_debounce.name: Input De-bounce
gpio.input_debounce.description: De-bounce time in ms for all inputs

gpio_0.trigger.name: GPIO 0 Trigger
gpio_0.trigger.description: Trigger an event on input level change (works only if `gpio_0.config := 'input'`)

gpio_1.trigger.name: GPIO 1 Trigger
gpio_1.trigger.description: Trigger an event on input level change (works only if `gpio_1.config := 'input'`)

gpio_2.trigger.name: GPIO 2 Trigger
gpio_2.trigger.description: Trigger an event on input level change (works only if `gpio_2.config := 'input'`)

gpio_3.trigger.name: GPIO 3 Trigger
gpio_3.trigger.description: Trigger an event on input level change (works only if `gpio_3.config := 'input'`)

gpio_4.trigger.name: GPIO 4 Trigger
gpio_4.trigger.description: Trigger an event on input level change (works only if `gpio_4.config := 'input'`)

gpio_5.trigger.name: GPIO 5 Trigger
gpio_5.trigger.description: Trigger an event on input level change (works only if `gpio_5.config := 'input'`)

gpio_6.trigger.name: GPIO 6 Trigger
gpio_6.trigger.description: Trigger an event on input level change (works only if `gpio_6.config := 'input'`)

gpio_7.trigger.name: GPIO 7 Trigger
gpio_7.trigger.description: Trigger an event on input level change (works only if `gpio_7.config := 'input'`)

net.hiam_time.name: HIAM Time
net.hiam_time.desc: Time in seconds between network invites

net.max_packet_latency.name: Max Packet Latency
net.max_packet_latency.desc: Maximum transport time in periods of 25s before a packet is eliminated, assumed undeliverable.

net.rssi_cc_assesment.name: RSSI Clear Channel Assessment level
net.rssi_cc_assesment.desc: Max RSSI for Clear Channel during Listen Before Talk

net.connect_check_time.name: Connect Check Time
net.connect_check_time.desc: Time in seconds between network evaluation
net.connect_check_time.comment: Must be equal or larger than HIAM for router modules

net.max_jump_count.name: Max Jump Count
net.max_jump_count.desc: Maximum number of transportation jumps before a packet is eliminated, assumed undeliverable.

net.command_retries.name: Command Retry
net.command_retries.desc: Retiries if no response to command transmit

net.tx_retry_limit.name: RF Transmit Retry Limit
net.tx_retry_limit.desc: Number of unsuccessful RF retries before a Router disconnects and attempts reconnecting to the network.

net.connect_change_margin.name: RSSI Change Margin
net.connect_change_margin.desc: Minimum difference in RSSI to justify automatic change of network connection

net.command_accept_time.name: Accept New Command Time Out
net.command_accept_time.desc: Minimum time before new command accepted (10 ms)

net.rssi_threshold.name: RSSI Acceptance Level
net.rssi_threshold.desc: Max RSSI for Clear Channel during Listen Before Talk

device.command_ack.name: HIACK Enable
device.command_ack.desc: Enable command acknowledge from destination node
device.command_ack.comment: Applicable in packet mode only. Broadcast commands will not generate HIACK

device.detect_busy_network.name: Detect Network Busy
device.detect_busy_network.desc: Gateway action when network activity detected after Reset.

cluster.rssi_threshold.name: Clustered Node RSSI
cluster.rssi_threshold.desc: RSSI level to form a node cluster

cluster.device_limit.name: Clustered Node Device Limit
cluster.device_limit.desc: Minimum number of densely located nodes to form a node cluster

rf_jamming.port.name: RF Tamper Alarm
rf_jamming.port.desc: GPIO port used for RF tamper alarm output

rf.mac_rnd_mask_1.name: MAC RndTime1Mask
rf.mac_rnd_mask_1.desc: Radio State 1 max delay mask. First TX

rf.mac_rnd_mask_2.name: MAC RndTime2Mask
rf.mac_rnd_mask_2.desc: Radio State 1 max delay mask. Repeat TX

uart.timeout.name: Serial Port Time Out
uart.timeout.desc: Time out in periods of 1ms between character inputs on serial port, before a packet is transmitted in Transparent mode.
uart.timeout.comment: An additional 2ms is automatically added. Actual Timing for setting 20 is 22 ms

uart.buffer_margin.name: Serial Buffer Full Margin
uart.buffer_margin.desc: Number of bytes left in Serial Buffer when CTS goes false and/or Xoff transmitted

ima.time.name: IMA Time
ima.time.desc: Time in minutes between automatic status messages
